# UNAlertStyle.alert

**Case**

Modal alerts.

## Declaration

```swift
case alert
```

## Discussion

Alerts are displayed in a modal window that must be dismissed explicitly by the user.

## Presentation Styles

- **UNAlertStyle.none**: No alert.
- **UNAlertStyle.banner**: Banner alerts.
title: UNAlertStyle.alert
